casebody.data:
The FOUR FELDS, INC., d/b/a L. Epstein Hardware Co., and Reasonable Lock & Safe Co. Inc., Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
CITY OF ORANGE TOWNSHIP, Defendant,
and
Oakwood Towers, Defendant-Respondent. C-381 September Term 2018
081797 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 6, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000093-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
